QuestData.Title: The Search For Research
QuestData.Description: My research notes are missing!$b$bThey must have gone missing during the podling attack on the research station. All of my work will be lost if they are not found!$b$bCome to think of it, I'm also missing my expedition supply bag, as well as my anti-fungal boots....$b$bHow can I do biological research without my equipment?!$b$bNo... this will not do at all.$b$bPlease, go and search the Zangar Shore for my missing belongings so that I may continue my fungal research!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the Research Journal, Expedition Supplies, and Anti-fungal Boots to Dr. Hadley Ricard.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you retrieved my missing belongings?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah! I see you have my research with you... and what's this? You also have my supply bag and the anti-fungal boots!$b$bSpectacular! I now have the tools I need to continue my research into the Zangar fungal strain....
